1.title: The IMDb Studio at Acura Festival Village

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Kevin Smith hosts IMDb's exclusive coverage of the Sundance Film Festival from The IMDb Studio at Acura Festival Village. Stay tuned for an advance look at the films, filmmakers, and celebrities at the event.

2.title: Haley Joel Osment on Zac Efron, Sexy Serial Killer

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Haley Joel Osment talks with Kevin Smith about working with Zac Efron on the upcoming Ted Bundy biopic 'Extremely Wicked, Shockingly Evil and Vile'.

3.title: Mindy Kaling's 'Late Night' Squad Storms Sundance

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: "The Office" co-stars Mindy Kaling and Amy Ryan reunite in 'Late Night,' a Sundance comedy about women working on a long-running talk show. Hear how director Nisha Ganatra brought together Mindy, Amy, and the rest of the cast.

4.title: Awkwafina Conducts an Empathy Orgy in 'The Farewell'

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Building on her 'Crazy Rich Asians' success, Awkwafina talks about the emotional journey to her first leading role in 'The Farewell.' The breakout star, her castmates, and director Lulu Wang discuss the Sundance drama, which is centered on members of a Chinese family who grapple with decisions based on their grandmother's terminal illness.

5.title: Emma Roberts Goes Future Tripping to 'Paradise Hills'

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Emma Roberts and her 'Paradise Hills' co-stars Milla Jovovich, Eiza González, and Danielle Macdonald chat about their new Sundance movie, their past successes, and some of their future projects.

6.title: Armie Hammer's Deep 'Wounds,' Zazie Beetz's Dope 'Joker'

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Armie Hammer discusses what attracted him 'Wounds' and why Babak Anvari was the perfect choice to adapt and direct the dark material. Meanwhile, his co-star Zazie Beetz confirms the dopeness of the "Joker' script.

7.title: Director Patty Jenkins Details 'Wonder Woman 1984'

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: At Sundance 2019, Patty Jenkins reveals select details about 'Wonder Woman 1984' to Kevin Smith inside the IMDb Studio at the Acura Festival Village.

8.title: Zac Efron and Lily Collins Shift Ted Bundy's Tale to Victim's Perspective

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Zac Efron, Lily Collins, Haley Joel Osment, and Angela Sarafyan join Joe Berlinger, the director of 'Extremely Wicked, Shockingly Evil and Vile,' to break down the reasons why their movie tells the story of serial killer Ted Bundy in a different way.

9.title: 'Velvet Buzzsaw' Crew on Their Crazy Trailer and Being a Trending Topic

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: At Sundance 2019, filmmaker Dan Gilroy and members of his 'Velvet Buzzsaw' cast stop into the IMDb Studio at the Acura Village to discuss the huge reaction to their trailer debut and what attracted them to the idea of making a thriller set in the contemporary art world.

10.title: Mark Duplass and Ray Romano's Bromance Brightens 'Paddleton'

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: As buzz builds for their Sundance movie 'Paddleton,' co-stars Mark Duplass and Ray Romano stop by the IMDb Studio at the Acura Village to talk about their on-and-off screen connection.

11.title: Young Carol Danvers Picks Between Captain Marvel and Captain America

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: Mckenna Grace is at Sundance 2019 with her movie 'Troop Zero,' but we couldn't resist asking her about her role as young Carol Danvers in 'Captain Marvel' and the indie movie she made with Captain America, Chris Evans.

12.title: Demi Moore and 'Corporate Animals' Cast Consider Casual Cannibalism

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: Patrick Brice and the cast of his horror/comedy 'Corporate Animals' discuss how the events of the movie quickly turn to thoughts of whether or not Demi Moore and company should eat one another after their team-building retreat goes off the rails.

13.title: Jeff Goldblum Picks at Your Brain in 'The Mountain'

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

13.plot: Jeff Goldblum and his co-star Tye Sheridan sit down with Kevin Smith at the IMDb Studio at Acura Festival Village to go deep into the brain of writer-director Rick Alverson and their movie 'The Mountain,' the story of a young man who, after losing his mother, works with a physician specializing in lobotomies.

14.title: The 'Fighting With My Family Cast' Are Now WWE Converts

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

14.plot: Writer/director Stephen Merchant, actress Florence Pugh, and her 'Fighting With My Family' castmates Lena Headey, Nick Frost, Vince Vaughn, and Jack Lowden discuss their fictional characters and their real-life counterparts, as well, as their love of the WWE. Joining them at the IMDb Studio at Acura Festival Village is former WWE superstar Paige, whose life story is the focus of the film.

2.title: 'Wiener-Dog': The Challenges of Working with a "Prima Donna" Dog

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Danny Devito, Julie Delpy, Greta Gerwig, Zosia Mamet, Kieran Culkin, and director Todd Solondz give insider details and the challenges of working with animal actors on their new Sundance film 'Wiener-Dog.'

3.title: Bradley Whitford Talks "Moving and Funny" Film 'Other People'

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Bradley Whitford spoke about his Sundance film 'Other People' and his amazing and funny cast mates. Check out this video to find out why this flick is not only moving and hilarious but also quite cathartic!

4.title: Bradley Whitford Jokes About the "Most Evil" Prankster in Hollywood

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Emmy-winning actor Bradley Whitford stopped by The IMDb Studio at Sundance and dropped some hilarious anecdotes about the biggest prankster he's ever worked with. Hint: It was on "The West Wing" set!

5.title: 'Christine' Cast and Director Reflects on Real Life of Christine

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Michael C. Hall, Rebecca Hall, Tracy Letts and director Antonio Campos talk about their Sundance film 'Christine,' which is based on real events. Plus find out why this is one of the director's favorite ensemble casts.

6.title: John Legend and Jurnee Smollett-Bell on Their New Series "Underground"

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: John Legend and Jurnee Smollett-Bell stopped by The IMDb Studio at Sundance to talk about their new show "Underground." John and Jurnee speak passionately how this is the first time a series focuses on the courageous men and women who risked their lives to break free from slavery by using the complex system of the Underground Railroad.

7.title: Spike Lee on Academy Changing Its Rules to Include More Diversity

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Spike Lee, who is debuting his new film 'Michael Jackson's Journey from Motown to Off the Wall' at the 2016 Sundance Film Festival, spoke with IMDb about the January 22 announcement that the Academy will be changing its rules to include more diversity in its voting process. Watch the video above to hear why Spike isn't changing his stance on boycotting the Oscars but why he commends the recent decision.

8.title: Kate Beckinsale, Chloe Sevigny and Director Whit Stillman on 'Love & Friendship'

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Kate Beckinsale, Chloe Sevigny, and Director Whit Stillman speak about shooting their film 'Love & Friendship.' They also reveal their favorite behind-the-scenes moments that involved cast-mate Steven Fry. Find out who was the biggest prankster. Plus, see how they fare in the IMDb Snow Hat game!

9.title: Spike Lee on 'Michael Jackson's Journey from Motown to Off the Wall'

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Director Spike Lee talks to IMDb about his latest documentary "Michael Jackson's Journey From Motown to Off the Wall.' Plus, find out how he feels about Michael Jackson's collaboration with Quincy Jones in 'The Wiz' and why working with Amazon Studios on his film 'Chi-Raq' has been an amazing experience.

10.title: Hilarious Chat With Sam Neill and Taika Waititi From 'Hunt for the Wilderpeople'

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: Sam Neill and director Taika Waititi speak to IMDb about their film 'Hunt for the Wilderpeople,' which they claim is an "homage to all the great '80s adventure films"! Plus, find out their favorite memories of making the movie and how one moment might have saved $2 million!

11.title: 'Tallulah' Cast and Filmmaker on Challenges of Working with Babies

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: Ellen Page, Allison Janney, John Benjamin, Tammy Blanchard, and filmmaker Sian Heder discuss their new drama 'Talulah.' Find out some of the challenges of working with babies and other memorable moments from the set.

12.title: 'The Greasy Strangler': How the Filmmakers Came Together

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: Filmmakers Elijah Wood, Jim Hosking, Josh Waller, and Daniel Noah crack us up as they discuss how they got involved with their slasher film/father-son comedy, 'The Greasy Strangler.'

13.title: Director Joshua Marston on Buzzy Sundance Drama 'Complete Unknown'

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

13.plot: Director Joshua Marston gives IMDb the lowdown about his new suspenseful drama 'Complete Unknown' and working with his cast, which includes Rachel Weisz and Michael Shannon, and Amazon Studios.

14.title: 'The Hollars': John Krasinski and Margo Martindale on the Film's Amazing Cast

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

14.plot: John Krasinski and Margo Martindale give IMDb the scoop on their new Sundance film 'The Hollars.' Find out why the movie's story is so special and learn why the cast is an embarrassment of riches.

15.title: Viggo Mortensen and Matt Ross on the Origins of Their Film 'Captain Fantastic'

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

15.plot: Viggo Mortensen and director Matt Ross talk about the origins of their film 'Captain Fantastic.' Find out how Viggo's fear of heights altered his lunch schedule in a hilarious way!

16.title: The Women of Dark Comedy "The Skinny" Talk Bulimia, Power of the Female Gaze

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

16.plot: Jill Soloway, Illeana Douglas, Jessie Kahnweiller, and Rebecca Odes discuss their new darkly comedic web series "The Skinny," which tackles bulimia and female shame.

17.title: 'The Birth of a Nation' Cast and Filmmaker on Heroism, the Nat Turner Rebellion

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

17.plot: Armie Hammer, Aja Naiomi King, Gabrielle Union, and Nate Parker open up about their historical drama 'The Birth of a Nation,' which delves into a side of the Nat Turner rebellion we haven't seen before. Plus, find out how Sundance helped him get his passion project off the ground.

18.title: 'The Free World' Cast and Filmmaker Talk Diversity on Set

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

18.plot: Elisabeth Moss, Octavia Spencer, Boyd Holdbrook, and director Jason Lew speak about their powerful new film, discuss diversity on the set, and also have some fun playing the IMDb Snow Hat game, where we find out what roles they are most recognized for.

19.title: 'Mr. Pig' Stars Maya Rudolph and Danny Glover on Challenges of Working Wth Pigs

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

19.plot: Maya Rudolph and Danny Glover speak to IMDb about their beautiful road movie 'Mr. Pig,' where they play an estranged father and daughter forced to come together. Find out what it was like working with pigs and how filming this movie was particularly special for Danny.

20.title: Bryce Dallas Howard on Her Very Personal Film 'Solemates'

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

20.plot: Bryce Dallas Howard sits down with IMDb to chat about her short film, which she says was a very personal story for her, and reveals that this was a family affair.

21.title: IMDb Snow Hat: My First On-Screen Kiss

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

21.plot: Bryce Dallas Howard, Chloe Sevigny, Kate Beckinsale, Michael C. Hall, and Elisabeth Moss are just a few of the stars at Sundance who got our favorite fan question in the IMDb snow hat game: What was your first on-screen kiss? Watch this video to find out who these A-listers smooched for the first time on camera. Hint: There might even be an on-screen kiss or two in this video!

22.title: IMDb Snow Hat: Sundance Stars Answer Burning Fan Questions

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

22.plot: When the Sundance stars like Maya Rudolph, John Legend, Armie Hammer, Allison Janney, and John Krasinski play the IMDb snow hat game and answer burning fan questions, hilarity ensues! Find out the stars' answers to some of these questions: What is the craziest thing a fan has ever done to you? What show are you obsessed with right now? What is an early IMDb credit you want people to revisit?

1.title: The Sundance Survival Guide

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: The trek to Park City, Utah, may seem daunting for first-timers, but self-proclaimed "old pro" and IMDb Special Correspondent Kevin Smith gives you the lowdown on Robert Redford's yearly fest in this Sundance Survival Guide. Kevin and IMDb will on site Friday, Jan. 19 through Monday, Jan. 22 with interviews and coverage of all the top movies and stars.

2.title: Kevin Smith's 5 Signs You're Watching a Sundance Movie

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: "Sundance movies come from the heart," proclaims filmmaker and IMDb Special Correspondent Kevin Smith. And he would know-- his 1994 film 'Clerks' launched his career after screening at the film fest. Since then, he's been back numerous times to compete, judge, and just enjoy. With that inside knowledge, Smith presents this guide to the telltale signs that you're watching a film that cuts the mustard at Sundance. Kevin and IMDb will on site Friday, Jan. 19 through Monday, Jan. 22 with interviews and coverage of all the top movies and stars.

3.title: John Cho's Sundance Film 'Search' Contributes to Language of Cinema

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Some viewers may remember him as MILF Guy #2 from 'American Pie' or one half of the 'Harold & Kumar' duo, but John Cho has a brand new, and somewhat unexpected, bag at 2018's Sundance Film Festival. Cho stars in the Sundance NEXT thriller 'Search' which takes place entirely on computer screens as a father traces his missing daughter, a filmmaking tactic that Cho hopes will contribute to the language of cinema. IMDb and our Special Correspondent Kevin Smith will be at Sundance from Friday, Jan. 19 through Monday, Jan. 22 with interviews and coverage of all the top ...

4.title: John Cho Addresses Quentin Tarantino 'Star Trek' Rumors

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Would John Cho be up to return as Sulu if Quentin Tarantino helmed the Enterprise for a 'Star Trek' movie? The actor who has played the Starfleet Captain in three feature films is interested in working with the 'Pulp Fiction' director, and he also allows IMDb Special Correspondent Kevin Smith a peek behind the curtain at how J.J. Abrams achieved some of the special effects on the first two movies.

-1.title: Kevin Smith's 5 Films to Watch at Sundance 2019

episode of.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (TV Series 2015– )

-1.plot: Kevin Smith hosts IMDb's exclusive coverage of the Sundance Film Festival from The IMDb Studio at Acura Festival Village. Stay tuned for an advance look at the films, filmmakers, and celebrities at the event.

imdb.title: The IMDb Studio at Sundance
akas: The IMDb Studio at Sundance (United States)
plot: From Sundance to Comic-Con, The IMDb Studio is stationed at the center of some of the year's biggest entertainment events. Get the scoop on the latest movies and TV shows through exclusive interviews, features, and behind-the-scenes footage.::IMDb
